item.title: Penelope Jones - No Matter What They Say(Feat.Mya)
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60996

No matter
what they say
I am here
to stay
I’m a ride
or die forever baby
They can say
I’m a fool
A fool
for loving you
And I know
that you made mistakes
Know you caught
a case
But we gon’ make it
through together baby
Maybe
I am a fool
A fool in love
with you woo
Yo yo
I remember back
When we first met
at the aspen aspen
Back when I first saw
you just passinon
Pants saggin
with your bastards?
So handsome
couldn’t fathom
One man with
so much passion
And uh
remember that time
Right
on the ocean
You said
you’d be thurr
But don’t be scurred
to come closer
Coast to coastin
bodies movin in motion
Give you one dose
to this potion
You’ll be floating
I’m focused
I wonder
why sometimes
You would
go back miles
Just to make me
smile and you’ll
Look right
into my eyes
And go turn
right around
And you’ll
make me cry but
No matter
what they say
I am here
to stay
I’m a ride
or die forever baby
They can say
I’m a fool
A fool
for loving you
And I know
that you made mistakes
Know you caught
a case
But we gon’ make it
through together baby
Maybe
I am a fool
A fool in love
with you woo
Yo do you
remember
April the 30th
on a friday(friday)
Cruisin around
doin it our way
Headin out of town
jus flippin our weight
And plus in the trunk
there’s a 45 hey
Now wait
I should’ve told him
His partners
wasn’t soldiers
But the love
was gettin strong
So instead I just
shrugged my shoulders
Like Xuck it
couple months
I’ll be riding
in that rover
But we was
doin good
‘Til them Popo’s
pulled us over
You held me down
through your town
I’m a stay
by your side
While you fight
your case baby
Just me and you
I’m still your boo
Can’t nobody
take your place and
No matter
what they say
I am here
to stay
I’m a ride
or die forever baby
They can say
I’m a fool
A fool
for loving you
And I know
that you made mistakes
Know you caught
a case
But we gon’ make it
through together baby
Maybe
I am a fool
A fool in love
with you woo
Now once again
it’s on
Now your hungry behave
or you’re gone
It’s ya case
gotta shot?
Let’s be
thankful for god
To have patience
was smart
Used to wait
it was hard
It was breakin
my heart
Let’s erase
let’s move on now
Ain’t no money gettin
aggy wit ma temper?
Let’s tell
the world how
We gettin married
in december and
And they can’t call us
some broke niggas
Just signed a deal now
I’m makin more figures
I’m locked
in before
I was beginning
to stray
I was boxed in
but now I just
Be spendin away
I don’t
Just pretend
to just play
‘Cause at the end
of the day
It’s a house
a couple of cars
Plus a kid
on the way
But sometimes
I wonder why
Time be goin by
and I be steady
Pumpin on my
la la la la
They can say
I’m a fool
But it’s cool if it’s
you that’s my boo woo
No matter
what they say
I am here
to stay
I’m a ride
or die forever baby
They can say
I’m a fool
A fool
for loving you
And I know
that you made mistakes
Know you caught
a case
But we gon’ make it
through together baby
Maybe
I am a fool
A fool in love
with you woo
